CustomField.description: No team should put the release at risk – Any Feature or change that is large enough or invasive enough to risk the release is behind a permission or equivalent safety valve
CustomField.inlineHelpText: No team should put the release at risk – Any Feature or change that is large enough or invasive enough to risk the release is behind a permission or equivalent safety valve (Yes/No)
CustomField.label: Large/Invasive changes are behind a perm
